heading: Proven Small Business Leadership
content: Led multiple companies through financial turnarounds, growth phases, and successful exits.

heading: Successful Owner Experience
content: P. Hightower, Principal, grew & sold a struggling tech company for a 10x return after transforming operations, product lines, and margins.

heading: Expertise in Business & Engineering
content: 35+ years of experience in CEO, COO, program management, and engineering leadership roles across multiple industries.
